question: Which venture capital influences on Twitter correlate with innovation-centric IT investments by diverse firms?

subtasks.task: Identify venture capital influencers on Twitter by extracting profiles with high engagement or follower count.
Extract posts related to innovation-centric IT investments from the identified venture capital influencers.
Analyze the extracted posts to identify mentions of diverse firms and their IT investment strategies.
Correlate the identified IT investment strategies with the influence metrics of the venture capitalists.
